snippet: The setback from the Nexus Q reveals deeper challenges for Google as it tries to move into two new areas: hardware and social technology.
abstract: Setback for Google's Nexus Q device for streaming video and music reveals deeper challenges for the company as it tries to move into two new areas: hardware and social technology; analysts say one problem is that most people have not purchased much in the way of music and movies from the firm.
lead_paragraph: The setback from the Nexus Q reveals deeper challenges for Google as it tries to move into two new areas: hardware and social technology.

headline.seo: Google Goes Back to the Drawing Board for Nexus Q
headline.main: Google Goes Back to the Drawing Board for Nexus Q
headline.print_headline: Back to the Drawing Board for Nexus Q
